verses.name: Jeremiah 12:6
verses.text: For even thy brethren, and the house of thy father, even they have dealt treacherously with thee; yea, they have called a multitude after thee: believe them not, though they speak fair words unto thee.

verses.name: Jeremiah 12:7
verses.text: I have forsaken mine house, I have left mine heritage; I have given the dearly beloved of my soul into the hand of her enemies.

verses.name: Jeremiah 12:8
verses.text: Mine heritage is unto me as a lion in the forest; it crieth out against me: therefore have I hated it.
